text: Wait, your girlfriend's husband? What's going on here...
Yeah. He works all day at Chase. Worked, I mean.
Oh I hate Chase. They didn't give me an auto loan. Good riddance.
Too bad european cheese isn't a publically traded stock. What the hell are you even doing here?
Oh boo hoo. Try saving the planet a little bit, asshole. It's making me more money
Ouch, that's a rough hit. But really, who puts their pup's money in stocks? Diversify next time, mate. 🐶💸
Sending a financial rescue team your way! Hold tight and maybe avoid stock tips from here on out? Just a thought. 🚒
Yo, that's a glow-up… sort of? At least you got wheels now, keep grinding! 🚗
Epic car but still in the basement? Time to cruise out of there, bro. 🏎️💨
Congrats on the car! Now time to invest in a home. Aim high! 🏡
Lambo taken and returned in a day? That's next level chaos, hang in there! 🏆
